title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts {with Bacon}
summary: Roasted Brussels Sprouts {with Bacon} is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal side dish. For $3.37 per serving, this recipe covers 37% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 1 servings with 362 calories, 16g of protein, and 19g of fat each. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Christmas. A mixture of bacon trim excess fat, olive oil, paprika, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 90%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes include Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Bacon, Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon, and Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon.
